data.text: @soapachu @Join_ZOE It’s all part of the strategy to pretend the pandemic is finished because it’s not a vote-winner and Johnson has got bored and moved on. The more people ruminate on the pandemic, the more they’ll reflect upon the fact that people in Downing St partied while people were dying.

If you think this is short-sighted, please take a moment to share your thoughts
https://t.co/pPQxIHR0D8
